figure.id: 1|From welfare schemes to cheetahs, PM Modi gives India a birthday gift every year

img.alt: Firstpost Image
img.title: Firstpost
img.id: 1|From welfare schemes to cheetahs, PM Modi gives India a birthday gift every year

div.h2: From welfare schemes to cheetahs, PM Modi gives India a birthday gift every year

a.p: Prime Minister Narendra Modis 75th birthday on September 17 will feature a massive nationwide celebration under Seva Pakhwada, including health camps, fitness events, and the launch of new welfare schemes. Over the past decade, the PMs birthdays have seen developmental milestones, from releasing cheetahs to empowering women and artisans

figure.id: 2|In Photos | The Emmys featured Gaza prominently. Here's how
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-143249209 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: Firstpost Image
img.title: In Photos | The Emmys featured Gaza prominently. Here's how
img.id: 2|In Photos | The Emmys featured Gaza prominently. Here's how

a.h2: In Photos | The Emmys featured Gaza prominently. Here's how
a.p: The 77th Emmy Awards held in Los Angeles featured the who's who of Hollywood. It also served as a platform for celebrities to extend their support to Gaza and highlight the plight of Palestinians amid the war. From Javier Bardem to Aimee Lou Wood, here's how Gaza was on almost everyone's mind at the event

figure.id: 3|Is Shashi Tharoors breakup with Congress inevitable?
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-143249209 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: Firstpost Image
img.title: Is Shashi Tharoors breakup with Congress inevitable?
img.id: 3|Is Shashi Tharoors breakup with Congress inevitable?

a.h2: Is Shashi Tharoors breakup with Congress inevitable?
a.p: The Congress is not hiding its chagrin at Shashi Tharoor anymore. The Thiruvananthapuram MP has upset the party again with his remarks on the 2016 surgical strikes. His recent unfettered support to the Centre on Operation Sindoor also did not go down well with Congress, which perceives it as straying from the party line

figure.id: 4|Naxalism will end in India by March 2026: Amit Shah at CRPF Raising Day parade
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-143249209 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: Firstpost Image
img.title: Naxalism will end in India by March 2026: Amit Shah at CRPF Raising Day parade
img.id: 4|Naxalism will end in India by March 2026: Amit Shah at CRPF Raising Day parade

a.h2: Naxalism will end in India by March 2026: Amit Shah at CRPF Raising Day parade
a.p: Union Home Minister Amit Shah announced that Naxalism will be eliminated by March 2026, with the CAPF and CRPF, especially the CoBRA unit playing a key role, during an event in Madhya Pradesh.

figure.id: 5|Why BJP chose Rekha Gupta as Delhi CM
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-143249209 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: Firstpost Image
img.title: Why BJP chose Rekha Gupta as Delhi CM
img.id: 5|Why BJP chose Rekha Gupta as Delhi CM

a.h2: Why BJP chose Rekha Gupta as Delhi CM
a.p: Rekha Gupta has taken oath as the Delhi chief minister, becoming the first leader from the BJP to assume the post after 27 years. While names like Parvesh Verma, Vijender Gupta and Satish Upadhyay were doing the rounds, the saffron party went ahead with a first-time MLA for the top job. But why?

figure.id: 6|Who is Rekha Gupta, first-time MLA, BJPs pick for Delhi CM?
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-143249209 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: Firstpost Image
img.title: Who is Rekha Gupta, first-time MLA, BJPs pick for Delhi CM?
img.id: 6|Who is Rekha Gupta, first-time MLA, BJPs pick for Delhi CM?

a.h2: Who is Rekha Gupta, first-time MLA, BJPs pick for Delhi CM?
a.p: Rekha Gupta is set to take oath as the fourth woman chief minister of Delhi. The 50-year-old, a senior BJP leader, won from Shalimar Bagh against AAPs Bandana Kumari. As she becomes the saffron partys fourth CM face in the national capital, lets look at her political journey

figure.id: 7|This Week in Explainers: How BJP wrested power from AAP in Delhi
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-143249209 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: Firstpost Image
img.title: This Week in Explainers: How BJP wrested power from AAP in Delhi
img.id: 7|This Week in Explainers: How BJP wrested power from AAP in Delhi

a.h2: This Week in Explainers: How BJP wrested power from AAP in Delhi
a.p: The BJP is returning to power in Delhi after nearly three decades with a decisive mandate. The AAPs loss was compounded by the defeat of its top leaders including chief Arvind Kejriwal. But what worked for the saffron party this time? We answer this and more in our weekly wrap from India

div.p: Latest Politics News

figure.id: 1|What future looks like for Arvind Kejriwal and AAP after Delhi drubbing
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-736194888 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: What future looks like for Arvind Kejriwal and AAP after Delhi drubbing
img.title: What future looks like for Arvind Kejriwal and AAP after Delhi drubbing
img.id: 1|What future looks like for Arvind Kejriwal and AAP after Delhi drubbing

a.h2: What future looks like for Arvind Kejriwal and AAP after Delhi drubbing

div.p: It was a bitter loss for the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) as it not only failed to return to power in Delhi but many of its top leaders including chief Arvind Kejriwal were also defeated by the BJP. This is the first time that Kejriwal lost from New Delhi, which he first won in 2013 by defeating the then CM Sheila Dikshit. What does the rout mean for him and his party?

figure.id: 2|Kejri-fall: Did the middle class ire dethrone AAP from Delhi?
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-736194888 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: Kejri-fall: Did the middle class ire dethrone AAP from Delhi?
img.title: Kejri-fall: Did the middle class ire dethrone AAP from Delhi?
img.id: 2|Kejri-fall: Did the middle class ire dethrone AAP from Delhi?

a.h2: Kejri-fall: Did the middle class ire dethrone AAP from Delhi?

div.p: After a decade in power, the Aam Aadmi Party leaders will now sit in the opposition benches in the Delhi Assembly. The BJP has ousted Arvind Kejriwals party, which was battling 10 years of anti-incumbency. Seen as a party that works only for the poor, the AAP also failed to win over the middle class, as it outraged at the citys lack of development

figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-736194888 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: Delhi Assembly elections: Arvind Kejriwal vs Parvesh Verma vs Sandeep Dikshit Key contests to keep an eye on

img.id: 3|Delhi Assembly elections: Arvind Kejriwal vs Parvesh Verma vs Sandeep Dikshit Key contests to keep an eye on

a.h2: Delhi Assembly elections: Arvind Kejriwal vs Parvesh Verma vs Sandeep Dikshit Key contests to keep an eye on

div.p: Delhi is going to the ballot tomorrow. As crores of voters seal the fate of 699 candidates in the fray, heres a look at the key fights

figure.id: 4|After Lok Sabha rout, is BJPs Smriti Irani going to contest Delhi Assembly polls?
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-736194888 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: After Lok Sabha rout, is BJPs Smriti Irani going to contest Delhi Assembly polls?
img.title: After Lok Sabha rout, is BJPs Smriti Irani going to contest Delhi Assembly polls?
img.id: 4|After Lok Sabha rout, is BJPs Smriti Irani going to contest Delhi Assembly polls?

a.h2: After Lok Sabha rout, is BJPs Smriti Irani going to contest Delhi Assembly polls?

div.p: Smriti Irani, who lost the 2024 Lok Sabha polls from Amethi, is reportedly being considered as the BJPs candidate from the Greater Kailash Assembly constituency. The AAP has fielded three-time MLA Saurabh Bharadwaj from the seat

figure.id: 5|Delhi Assembly polls: Can Arvind Kejriwals AAP pull off a hat-trick?
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-736194888 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: Delhi Assembly polls: Can Arvind Kejriwals AAP pull off a hat-trick?
img.title: Delhi Assembly polls: Can Arvind Kejriwals AAP pull off a hat-trick?
img.id: 5|Delhi Assembly polls: Can Arvind Kejriwals AAP pull off a hat-trick?

a.h2: Delhi Assembly polls: Can Arvind Kejriwals AAP pull off a hat-trick?

div.p: Delhi will vote on February 5, with the counting of votes three days later on February 8. The AAP is hoping to return to power for a third term, while its rivals the BJP and the Congress are trying to dislodge Arvind Kejriwals party in the National Capital

figure.id: 6|BJP may keep CM post, Shiv Sena to get plum Cabinet berths: What Maharashtra government could look like
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-736194888 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: BJP may keep CM post, Shiv Sena to get plum Cabinet berths: What Maharashtra government could look like
img.title: BJP may keep CM post, Shiv Sena to get plum Cabinet berths: What Maharashtra government could look like
img.id: 6|BJP may keep CM post, Shiv Sena to get plum Cabinet berths: What Maharashtra government could look like

a.h2: BJP may keep CM post, Shiv Sena to get plum Cabinet berths: What Maharashtra government could look like

div.p: Eknath Shinde has hinted that he is out of the race for the Maharashtra CM post, saying he will abide by PM Narendra Modis and Union Home Minister Amit Shahs decision on the matter. This means the path is clear for the BJP to appoint its own face for the top job. Heres what its Mahayuti allies Shiv Sena and NCP could get

figure.id: 7|Why NCPs Ajit Pawar would prefer Devendra Fadnavis as Maharashtra CM
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-736194888 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: Why NCPs Ajit Pawar would prefer Devendra Fadnavis as Maharashtra CM
img.title: Why NCPs Ajit Pawar would prefer Devendra Fadnavis as Maharashtra CM
img.id: 7|Why NCPs Ajit Pawar would prefer Devendra Fadnavis as Maharashtra CM

a.h2: Why NCPs Ajit Pawar would prefer Devendra Fadnavis as Maharashtra CM

div.p: Three days to the results, the Mahayuti is yet to declare its chief ministerial face for Maharashtra. While the BJP leaders are backing Devendra Fadnavis, Shiv Sena is pushing for Eknath Shindes name. Ajit Pawar of the NCP, the third partner in the alliance, is reportedly rooting for Fadnavis. Heres why

figure.id: 8|Mahayutis Maha dilemma: What are the chances of Devendra Fadnavis becoming CM?
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-736194888 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: Mahayutis Maha dilemma: What are the chances of Devendra Fadnavis becoming CM?
img.title: Mahayutis Maha dilemma: What are the chances of Devendra Fadnavis becoming CM?
img.id: 8|Mahayutis Maha dilemma: What are the chances of Devendra Fadnavis becoming CM?

a.h2: Mahayutis Maha dilemma: What are the chances of Devendra Fadnavis becoming CM?

div.p: Maharashtra has delivered a clear mandate for the Mahayuti, with the alliance grabbing 230 of the 288 Assembly seats. Now, the BJP-led grouping has to decide its CM pick. Will the saffron party choose Devendra Fadnavis, the frontrunner, or follow coalition dharma and continue with Eknath Shinde?

figure.id: 9|How women voters changed the game in favour of the incumbent in Maharashtra and Jharkhand
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-736194888 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: How women voters changed the game in favour of the incumbent in Maharashtra and Jharkhand
img.title: How women voters changed the game in favour of the incumbent in Maharashtra and Jharkhand
img.id: 9|How women voters changed the game in favour of the incumbent in Maharashtra and Jharkhand

a.h2: How women voters changed the game in favour of the incumbent in Maharashtra and Jharkhand

div.p: The Assembly elections in Maharashtra and Jharkhand showcased the power of women voters, driven by targeted welfare schemes like Maharashtras Ladki Bahin Yojana and Jharkhands Mukhyamantri Maiya Samman Yojana. These initiatives boosted female voter turnout significantly, helping the ruling Mahayuti and JMM-led alliances secure decisive victories

figure.id: 10|What next for Uddhav Thackeray after Maharashtra setback?
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-736194888 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: What next for Uddhav Thackeray after Maharashtra setback?
img.title: What next for Uddhav Thackeray after Maharashtra setback?
img.id: 10|What next for Uddhav Thackeray after Maharashtra setback?

a.h2: What next for Uddhav Thackeray after Maharashtra setback?

div.p: Uddhav Thackeray's Shiv Sena (UBT) suffered a crushing defeat in the Maharashtra Assembly polls, winning just 20 of 94 contested seats compared to Eknath Shindes faction, which secured 57 of 85. The results have raised questions about Thackerays ability to retain his partys cadre and his claim to Bal Thackerayslegacy

figure.id: 11|Maharashtra Assembly election results: Why Devendra Fadnavis is BJPs man of the match
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-736194888 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: Maharashtra Assembly election results: Why Devendra Fadnavis is BJPs man of the match
img.title: Maharashtra Assembly election results: Why Devendra Fadnavis is BJPs man of the match
img.id: 11|Maharashtra Assembly election results: Why Devendra Fadnavis is BJPs man of the match

a.h2: Maharashtra Assembly election results: Why Devendra Fadnavis is BJPs man of the match

div.p: Devendra Fadnavis 2019 chant of Me punha yein (Ill be back) could come true this time. His BJP has delivered a stellar performance in the Maharashtra Assembly polls, with calls rising from within the party for his return as the states chief minister

figure.id: 12|Devendra Fadnavis or Eknath Shinde? Who will be Maharashtra CM after Mahayutis massive win?
figure.class: jsx-3761b56b8e69be20 jsx-736194888 image__container latest_category_news image__container--grad image__container--bdrRds

img.alt: Devendra Fadnavis or Eknath Shinde? Who will be Maharashtra CM after Mahayutis massive win?
img.title: Devendra Fadnavis or Eknath Shinde? Who will be Maharashtra CM after Mahayutis massive win?
img.id: 12|Devendra Fadnavis or Eknath Shinde? Who will be Maharashtra CM after Mahayutis massive win?

a.h2: Devendra Fadnavis or Eknath Shinde? Who will be Maharashtra CM after Mahayutis massive win?

div.p: The Mahayuti is set to return to power in Maharashtra, with a thumping victory. The BJP is itself winning over 100 seats, while its allies Shiv Sena and NCP have also performed well. Now, the question on everyones mind is: Who will be the next chief minister? With multiple options, it may not be an easy decision

figure.id: 13|Whats the cash-for-vote row involving BJPs Vinod Tawde, a day before Maharashtra Assembly polls?

a.h2: Whats the cash-for-vote row involving BJPs Vinod Tawde, a day before Maharashtra Assembly polls?

div.p: BJP national general secretary Vinod Tawde is at the centre of a political storm in Maharashtra, just a day before the state votes. The regional outfit Bahujan Vikas Aghadi (BVA) has accused him of distributing money to influence voters in Palghar. Heres what is going on

a.h2: Maharashtra assembly elections 2024: How splits and mergers are not new to state politics

div.p: The big fight is among two of the largest alliances in the state -- Mahayuti and Maha Vikas Aghadi. The journey through which regional politics in Maharashtra has reached its current state where the contest is among two alliances has a precedence worth mentioning
